title: 2018 and 2022
author: VD
content_html: Russia? That makes a degree of sense given the way in which Russian commodity wealth is making itself felt throughout the sports world. And Vladimir Putin is nothing if not a sports enthusiast. But Qatar? It’s not as if I was planning on attending the World Cup no matter where it is, but an Arab country seems like a rather unusual choice of venue given the present difficulties from Afghanistan to Iran.
content_text: Russia?  That makes a degree of sense given the way in which Russian commodity wealth is making itself felt throughout the sports world.  And Vladimir Putin is nothing if not a sports enthusiast.  But Qatar?  It’s not as if I was planning on attending the World Cup no matter where it is, but an Arab country seems like a rather unusual choice of venue given the present difficulties from Afghanistan to Iran.
